Toothbrush App: Develop an app that reminds users to brush their teeth regularly and tracks their brushing habits. Users can set reminders for specific times of the day, and the app can provide personalized feedback and recommendations based on their brushing habits.

Toothbrush with Built-in Timer: Create a toothbrush with a built-in timer that alerts users when it's time to switch to a new quadrant or to stop brushing. This can help users ensure they brush for the recommended two minutes and evenly distribute their brushing time across all areas of their mouth.

Toothbrush with Sensors: Develop a toothbrush with sensors that can detect areas of the mouth that are not being brushed properly and provide feedback to the user. This can help users ensure they are brushing all areas of their mouth evenly and effectively.

Toothbrush with UV Light: Create a toothbrush with a UV light that the toothbrush bristles with a special light that bacteria from the bristles. This can help users ensure they are using a clean toothbrush and reduce the risk of oral health issues caused by bacteria buildup.

Toothbrush with Customizable Bristles: Develop a toothbrush with customizable bristles that can be adjusted to different levels of firmness and sensitivity. This can help users find a toothbrush that is comfortable for them to use and effectively removes plaque and debris from their teeth.
